message.raw: Removed the version specification rpy2<2.9 in setup.py. When Segtools is installed in a Python 2 environment, rpy 2.8.6 is installed. When Segtools is installed in a Python 3 environment using conda, rpy 2.9 is installed. In this case, if we force rpy2<2.9, it will lead to errors
